name: C.O.F Project (Prototype)
description:
Install instructions

This build of COF Project is a prototype to figure out if the base controls are good enough. This way i'll be able to truly begin devolpment on the main feature of the game. Nothing is final at this point so don't worry and thanks in advance for your feedbacks. 

I advise you to play with a controller for now if you have one ! 

And here the base control to play : 

- A Button to Jump 

- X Button while moving to Slide under obstacles

You will learn the rest naturally except if i did a bad job at conveying how things work !  

Have a nice day !
